casebody.data:
McCALLUM, Respondent, v. HOBOKEN FERRY CO., Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. February 15, 1894.) Action by John W. McCallum against the Hoboken Ferry'Company.

Argued before HARDIN, P. X, and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment and order affirmed, with costs, and leave granted to defendant to answer, on payment of costs of demurrer and of the appeal.
